entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
